Package ohos.media.tubecore

Class AVTubeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.tubecore.AVTubeManager

  • public class AVTubeManager
extends Object
    Represents the media tube manager.
    Since:
    5
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  AVTubeManager.ObserverFlag
      Provides flags for media tube observers.
      static interface  AVTubeManager.TubeObserver
      Provides callbacks to listen for media tube changes.

      • getInstance

        public static AVTubeManager getInstance​(Context context)
        Obtains an AVTubeManager instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context. If the same context is passed, this method returns the same instance.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVTubeManager instance.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Throws this exception if context is null.
        Since:
        5

      • defaultTube

        public AVTube defaultTube​()
        Obtains the default AVTube instance.

        The default AVTube instance always exists.

        Returns:
        Returns the default AVTube instance.
        Since:
        5

      • getTubeByIndex

        public Optional<AVTube> getTubeByIndex​(int index)
        Obtains the AVTube instance at a specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the instance index. The value must be greater than 0 and less than tubeNumber(). If an invalid index is passed, an unexpected result may occur.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVTube instance at the specified index.
        Since:
        5

      • tubeNumber

        public int tubeNumber​()
        Obtains the number of all AVTube instances.
        Returns:

      • tubeInUse

        public Optional<AVTube> tubeInUse​(int usageScenes)
        Obtains the AVTube instances that are being used in specific scenes.
        Parameters:
        usageScenes - Indicates the scenes.
        Returns:
        Returns the AVTube instances.
        Since:
        5

      • useTube

        public void useTube​(AVTube tube,
                    int usageScenes)
        Sets an AVTube instance for specific scenes.

        Before calling this method, you should ensure that the media tube supports the scenes.

        Parameters:
        tube - Indicates the specified AVTube instance.
        usageScenes - Indicates the scenes where the specified media tube to be used, which can be AVTube.UsageScene#REAL_TIME_AUDIO, AVTube.UsageScene#REAL_TIME_VIDEO, AVTube.UsageScene#USER_EXTENDED, or any combination of them.
        Since:
        5

      • addTubeObserver

        public void addTubeObserver​(AVTubeManager.TubeObserver observer,
                            int usageScenes,
                            int flags)
        Registers a tube observer with this AVTubeManager instance.
        Parameters:
        observer - Indicates the observer to register, which is an AVTubeManager.TubeObserver instance.
        usageScenes - Indicates the scenes where the observed media tubes are used.
        flags - Indicates the observer flag. The value can be AVTubeManager.ObserverFlag#NO_FLAG or AVTubeManager.ObserverFlag#IGNORE_FILTER. The latter means that the observer listens for all media tubes managed by this AVTubeManager instance, regardless of the usage scenes.
        Since:
        5

      • removeTubeObserver

        public void removeTubeObserver​(AVTubeManager.TubeObserver observer)
        Removes a specified observer from this AVTubeManager instance.
        Parameters:
        observer - Indicates the observer to remove.
        Since:
        5

      • createTubeSet

        public Optional<AVTube.SetInfo> createTubeSet​(String name)
        Creates a SetInfo instance for a media tube type.
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the name of the type.
        Returns:
        Returns the created SetInfo instance.
        Since:
        5
